title: Trump news live: Latest updates as president 'worried' about impeachment over Ukraine scandal
text:
Donald Trump conceded impeachment is a “bad thing to have on your resume” during a phone call with House Republicans on Friday, a rare confession that he fears for his legacy as the Ukraine scandal rumbles on.

As a second whistleblower emerged to support the first's account of the damning 25 July call with Volodymyr Zelensky, the president spent the weekend lashing out at his political enemies, posting no fewer than 88 tweets attacking Democratic rivals Joe Biden, Nancy Pelosi and Adam Schiff and labelling Republican 2012 presidential candidate Mitt Romney a “pompous ‘ass’” for daring to break ranks and suggest he has questions to answer.

The administration meanwhile says it will withdraw American troops from the Syria border to clear the way for Turkish operations against the Kurds, formerly a key US ally in the fight against Isis.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.
